room_title: Escape room "King Tut’s Curse" by Espionage Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
review: This escape room is my favorite and this is my favorite room in Chicagoland. The theme and decor is great. The place also has a great small town local feel and the owner is great. Inside the room the clues are great and enough to keep you guessing right until the last second. The game is built super well to where you it takes just around an hour for the average person to get out. The ending of the game is also super cool!

room_title: Escape room "King Tut’s Curse" by Espionage Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
review: Loved it, we had a blast with our kids. The Egyptian theme was Awesome!

room_title: Escape room "King Tut’s Curse" by Espionage Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
review: We have been trying a lot of escape rooms lately and we really enjoyed the King Tut Experience! It was creative and full of interesting clues and great interaction! Can’t wait to try another from Espionage.

room_title: Escape room "King Tut’s Curse" by Espionage Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
review: King Tut room was so cool! The owner was awesome, the room was super well put together, challenging, fun and exciting! The best escape room we have visited thus far.

room_title: Escape room "King Tut’s Curse" by Espionage Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
review: This was such a fun and unexpected outing! The Egyptian room is so well put together and thought-out. I highly recommend as a group outing!

room_title: Escape room "King Tut’s Curse" by Espionage Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
review: Had an awesome time! We did the King Tut room. Was skeptical at first, actually bought the group tickets for a Christmas present for my wife. I knew she would definitely enjoy something like this and tried to give her a night out with the girls. Well, it turned into a fun family night out. Had a ton of fun and will definitely try and get back to do the other room. Thanks for the experience!
